title: Move torchvision docs to pytorch/vision
body_html:
Because torchvision docs are in pytorch/pytorch any new functions in pytorch/vision required 2 PRs. For complete discussion, please see pytorch/vision#284. So this PR removes docs from here.

This is a series of three PRs:

  1. pytorch/vision#285: add docs to pytorch/vision
  2. Current one: remove docs from pytorch/pytorch
  3. pytorch/builder#11: builder script

Order of merging: 1, 2, 3.

Docs are built by copying vision/docs/source to pytorch/docs/source/torchvision.
Advantages of this solution:

  1. Separation of docs.
  2. Old links work.

Current one: remove docs from pytorch/pytorch
pytorch/builder#11: builder script

Order of merging: 1, 2, 3.
Docs are built by copying vision/docs/source to pytorch/docs/source/torchvision.
Advantages of this solution:

Separation of docs.
Old links work.
body:
Because torchvision docs are in pytorch/pytorch any new functions in pytorch/vision required 2 PRs. For complete discussion, please see https://github.com/pytorch/vision/issues/284. So this PR removes docs from here. 

This is a series of three PRs:
1. https://github.com/pytorch/vision/pull/285: add docs to pytorch/vision
2. Current one: remove docs from pytorch/pytorch
3. https://github.com/pytorch/builder/pull/11: builder script

Order of merging: 1, 2, 3.

Docs are built by copying `vision/docs/source` to `pytorch/docs/source/torchvision`.
Advantages of this solution:
1. Separation of docs.
2. Old links work.
